phases.objective: Open a mobile browser and type in https://www.atob.com.

assertions.description: Verify that https://www.atob.com loads completely without errors on a mobile browser.
Verify that verify the page displays a mobile-optimized responsive design.

phases.objective: Navigate to Quickly scroll down the mobile-optimized homepage, focusing on headlines, concise value propositions, and prominent call-to-action buttons.

assertions.description: Verify that verify headlines, concise value propositions, and prominent call-to-action buttons are clearly visible and well-formatted on the mobile homepage.

phases.objective: Tap on the hamburger menu icon (if present) to reveal navigation options, then select 'Fuel Cards' or 'Product' to go to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the hamburger menu icon functions correctly and allows navigation to the product page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

phases.objective: Navigate to On the product page, quickly scroll to find bulleted lists of key features and concise benefit summaries, avoiding detailed paragraphs.

assertions.description: Verify that verify key features and benefits are presented in concise, easy-to-read formats (e.g., bulleted lists) suitable for mobile viewing.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and tap a clear, thumb-friendly 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button to consider the next step (e.g., proceeding to a simplified signup form or lead capture).

assertions.description: Verify that verify a clear, thumb-friendly 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button is visible and tapping it initiates the next step (e.g., simplified signup form).

phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com, potentially from a browser bookmark or direct URL entry.

assertions.description: Verify that https://www.atob.com loads completely without errors.

phases.objective: Scroll briefly on the homepage to see if there are any new announcements or prominent calls to action since their last visit.

assertions.description: Verify that verify any prominent calls to action or new announcement sections are visible on the homepage.

phases.objective: Click on 'Fuel Card Details' to revisit https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards and re-evaluate specific features or benefits that were previously unclear or of new interest.

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully navigated to the product details page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

phases.objective: Navigate to After reviewing details on the product page, click on the 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' call-to-action button, which leads to https://www.atob.com/get-started.

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully navigated to the sign-up/application page (https://www.atob.com/get-started).

phases.objective: Navigate to Begin filling out the signup form, potentially benefiting from browser autofill for previously entered details.
Navigate to https://www.atob.com and quickly scan the main hero section for the value proposition.

assertions.description: Verify that https://www.atob.com loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify the main hero section's value proposition is clearly visible.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click the prominently displayed 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button on the homepage.

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is redirected to the sign-up/application page (e.g., /get-started).

phases.objective: Navigate to On the sign-up form (https://www.atob.com/get-started), efficiently fill in required fields such as company name, contact info, and fleet size.
Click the 'Submit Application' button to proceed to the next step or confirmation.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the application form submits successfully and a confirmation or next step is presented.

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com, immediately looking for 'Pricing', 'Savings', or 'Cost' related links on the homepage.

assertions.description: Verify that https://www.atob.com loads completely without errors.
Verify that 'Pricing', 'Savings', or 'Cost' related links are visible on the homepage, if present.

phases.objective: Navigate to If no direct pricing page link, click on 'Fuel Card Details' or 'Product' to reach https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards, anticipating cost and savings information there.

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully navigated to the product page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

phases.objective: Navigate to On the product page, actively scan for sections detailing fees, discounts, typical savings, or the presence of a savings calculator.

assertions.description: Verify that verify sections detailing fees, discounts, typical savings, or a savings calculator are present and visible on the product page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Note down key figures or take a screenshot to facilitate external comparison with competitor offerings.

assertions.description: Verify that key figures or data points relevant for cost comparison are clearly displayed.

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and browse the top navigation or look for a 'Learn More' section about products.

assertions.description: Verify that https://www.atob.com loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify the top navigation bar or a 'Learn More' section is visible.

phases.objective: Click on a link titled 'Fuel Cards' or 'Our Product' to access the dedicated product page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully navigated to the product page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

phases.objective: Scroll thoroughly down the product page, reading detailed descriptions of features, benefits, use cases, and FAQs.

assertions.description: Verify that verify sections with detailed descriptions of features, benefits, use cases, and FAQs are present and visible on the product page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Investigate specific sections like 'How it Works', 'Key Benefits', and 'Eligibility Criteria' to gain a full understanding.

assertions.description: Verify that verify 'How it Works', 'Key Benefits', and 'Eligibility Criteria' sections are present and contain relevant information.
